description: Base classes for implementing an C# .NET application using the MVVM architecture
releaseNotes:
This release includes improved XML documentation, more interfaces and more:
- adjust visibility of methods and make more methods virtual
- ViewModelCommand and AsyncViewModelCommand now has a Name property which defaults to the name of its type including its namespace
- remove BindableCommand and integrate logic in ViewModelCommand
- abstract method ViewModelCommand.DoExecute is now called Execute
- remove AsyncBindableCommand and integrate logic in AsyncViewModelCommand
- abstract method AsyncViewModelCommand.DoExecute is now called ExecuteAsync
- throw ArgumentNullExceptions for parameters which should not be null
- rename BindableBase to Bindable
- rename ComputedBindableBase to ComputedBindable
- ComputedBindable now introduces a virtual RaisePropertyChanged method with all indirect notified propertyNames as a second argument
- ViewModel now has a Commands property of type Dictionary<string, ICommand>. The key will be its name, the value the command itself. Commands should be added to this Dictionary for the CanExecuteSourceAttribute to work
- Bindable now implements INotifyPropertyChanging in addition to INotifyPropertyChanged

New interfaces:
- INamedCommand: Defines a Name property which uniquely identifies the command
- IRaiseErrorsChanged: Provides methods for raising events on the ErrorsChanged event handler.
- IRaisePropertyChanged: Provides methods for raising events on the PropertyChanged event handler.
- IDialogModel: Defines a viewmodel to use in a dialog
- ITreeViewModel: Defines a viewmodel to use in a tree view
- IValidatingViewModel: Defines a viewmodel which performs validation
- IViewModel: Defines a viewmodel
